color_a.name: Fluorescent Orange
color_a.use: Gus body, lava glow, warm elements

character.name: Gus
character.visual_prompt: A small cute salamander with a round smooth head, big friendly eyes, stubby legs, and a distinctive CURLY SPIRAL TAIL. Body is solid orange, belly is yellow. SMOOTH BACK - absolutely NO spikes, NO dorsal ridge, NO fin. Bold black outlines. Simple cartoon style.

pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: Gus the orange SALAMANDER standing at the BASE of a tall green mountain, looking up curiously. Tiny wisps of gray smoke rising from the distant peak. Gus has a CURLY SPIRAL TAIL and SMOOTH BACK (no spikes). Blue sky, green grass at base. Expression: curious. Simple flat Riso style.

pages.text: Gus sat on a big rock.
pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Gus the orange SALAMANDER sitting peacefully on a gray rock in a grassy meadow. A tall GREEN mountain visible in far background with tiny gray smoke wisps at top. SMOOTH BACK (no spikes), curly spiral tail relaxed. Expression: content. Simple flat Riso style.

WIDE SHOT: Gus the orange SALAMANDER standing in foreground, pointing up at a large GREEN mountain in the distance. Small gray smoke wisps at the peak - NOT fire, NOT lava, just gentle smoke. SMOOTH BACK (no spikes), curly spiral tail perked. Expression: curious. Simple flat Riso style, minimal colors.

MEDIUM SHOT: Gus the orange SALAMANDER shielding his eyes with one hand, looking up at gray smoke wisps rising from a GREEN mountain peak. NOT a volcano erupting - just a peaceful mountain with smoke. SMOOTH BACK (no spikes), curly spiral tail alert. Expression: intrigued. Simple flat Riso style.

CLOSE-UP: Gus the orange SALAMANDER with determined, confident expression. Fist raised in the air triumphantly - he's decided to go! SMOOTH BACK (no spikes), curly spiral tail bouncing with enthusiasm. Solid orange/yellow background. Simple flat Riso style.
DYNAMIC SHOT: Gus running up a grassy hillside path toward the mountain. Curly spiral tail streaming behind. Legs in motion, joyful running. Mountain looming ahead. Expression: happy, adventurous.
WIDE SHOT: Gus climbing higher on the rocky mountain slope. Getting smaller as terrain gets steeper. Smoke wisps above him. Curly spiral tail visible. Expression: determined, focused on climbing.

MEDIUM SHOT: Gus standing proudly at the crater RIM, looking DOWN into it from the EDGE. He is on solid rock, peering over. Curly spiral tail curled with excitement. Warm orange glow from below illuminating his face. Expression: amazed, eyes wide.

CLOSE-UP: Gus the orange SALAMANDER feeling the heat - wiping brow with one hand. Standing safely on gray rocky rim. Warm orange glow from below. SMOOTH BACK (absolutely no spikes or ridges), curly spiral tail drooping. Expression: surprised by warmth. Simple flat Riso style.

OVER-SHOULDER SHOT: View from behind Gus the orange SALAMANDER as he peers DOWN into the crater. Bubbling orange lava FAR BELOW in the crater. Gus safely on the gray rim. SMOOTH BACK (no spikes, no ridges - just smooth orange skin), curly spiral tail visible. Simple flat Riso style.

CLOSE-UP: Gus the orange SALAMANDER's face - cute round head with big happy eyes and small open mouth showing amazement. Proportional features (not oversized). Orange glow on his face from below. Expression: wonder and joy. Simple flat Riso style.

pages.text: HISS! PUFF! The smoke got big!
pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: The mountain releasing a big puff of gray smoke and white steam. Gus the orange SALAMANDER stepping back from the gray rim, startled. SMOOTH BACK (no spikes), curly spiral tail alert. Gray and black smoke dominates - NOT too orange. Simple flat Riso style with black, orange, yellow only.

MEDIUM SHOT: Gus the orange SALAMANDER turning to leave, looking back at the smoking crater. He has a small round nose. SMOOTH BACK (no spikes), curly spiral tail swishing. Gray rocky ground, gray smoke behind. Expression: satisfied, time to go. Simple flat Riso style - orange Gus against gray/black background.

DYNAMIC SHOT: Gus running/sliding down the mountain path happily. Not panicked - just energetic descent. Curly spiral tail streaming. Smoke from volcano visible in background. Expression: happy, bouncy run downhill.

MEDIUM SHOT: Gus back at his original rock in the meadow, sitting down with satisfaction. Mountain with gentle smoke visible in far background. Curly spiral tail relaxed and curled. Expression: content, happy to be back.

CLOSE-UP: Gus the orange SALAMANDER with a knowing, happy smile. Looking at viewer, sharing his adventure. SMOOTH BACK (no spikes, no ridges), curly spiral tail making a happy curl. Warm sunset yellow/orange background. Expression: proud, satisfied. Simple flat Riso style.

WIDE SHOT: Gus the orange SALAMANDER waving goodbye from his rock. Green mountain peaceful with gentle gray smoke in background. Sunset yellow sky. SMOOTH BACK (no spikes, no ridges), curly spiral tail waving. Expression: friendly wave. Simple flat Riso style.
